casebody.data:
MG&S ENTERPRISE, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Appellant,
v.
TRAVELERS CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA, a Foreign Corporation; Steve Stiles, Individually; and Insurance Services Corporation, Inc., d/b/a Stiles Insurance Services, Respondents. No. 69622 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 21, 2018

AFFIRMED.
